value:
Didn't plan on being a mercenary, but
a friend of mine said he wanted to be
the greatest warrior in all the land...$k$pI figured I was already better than
him, so...why not keep it that way?

Huh? The appeal of mercenary life?
Well, there's the drinking...

I never lie to friends. It can make
mercenary life tougher, but...if that's
how it is, that's how it is.

Hey there, boss! Just who I was
lookin' for. Care to join me for a
refreshing beverage?

Can't go slackin' off during training.
My skill with the blade still ain't
much, so I've got to focus to survive.

I'm Gerik, a mercenary in the service
of $Nf.

Not bad, eh? Sometimes all you need
to succeed is a little brute force!
Could be better, could be worse...
I'm trying my best over here...

More fighting coming up, huh? Got it.
No complaints here. Work's work.

I'm Gerik. Just another average
mercenary, I'm afraid. I'll earn my
keep, though. Just watch.

When I was younger, before I'd ever
lost a duel, I thought I was invincible.
But I was set straight before long.$k$pThen I fought this knight from...some
country or another. After we crossed
swords, this scar was my reward.$k$pI'd never endured such a crushing
defeat, and it shook me to my core.
My first encounter with true fear.$k$pI realized then that I hadn't come as
far as I had on my own. There were
others who helped me along the way.$k$pSo ever since, I've dedicated myself
to fighting for others, not just myself.
And, uh...here we are.$k$pAs long as there's work and pay, I'll
support and protect you. I swear it on
my honor as a mercenary.
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
This is my job.
You're on!
Ain't gonna be easy.
No one can touch me!
This day had to come...
Ha ha ha!
I'm Gerik, leader of a band of mercenaries. Hope we get along.
Hm? What's that? If you want a fight, let's go.
If you let yourself get intimidated, you've already lost. Garcia taught me that.
I was young and stupid, once. This scar is my punishment.
Before I became a mercenary... Ah! Gambling was my one true love in life.
Life's a funny thing. You might find yourself fighting alongside your friend's killer, or end up in another world altogether...
I'll stick with you to the end. You see... You've got to show some backbone if you want to be a leader.
I like the sound of that.
Hey.
Got a plan?
